dk.statsbiblioteket.util
Class FilePermissionException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              dk.statsbiblioteket.util.FilePermissionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FilePermissionException
extends java.io.IOException

An IOException thrown by operations requiring certain file permissions rights to work when the required permissions are not present.

See Also:
